pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the Azure Resource group of which a given Analysis Services server is part. This name must be at least 1 character in length, and no more than 90.

pathParameters.name: serverName
pathParameters.description: The name of the Analysis Services server. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: A unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
